title: Drawing, "Design for Fountain with Tritone", 1815
medium: Black chalk and graphite on cream laid paper
markings: Watermark: escutcheon, F I  within. Above cross. Below F
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Fountain with curved front.  Triton and Nereids shown beside a central mask with large eyes and mouth of which water pours into lower basin.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Fountain with Tritone", 1815.
1815. Black chalk and graphite on cream laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-3039.
